title: House for sale in malabe
details:
New modern House for Sale Malabe,
15 perches with free area
Clear deed.

- The house is completely tiled
- 3 Bed rooms
- 1 bathrooms
- Large Living, dining, pantry area (with pantry cupboard)
- Calm & quiet highly residential area
- 20 feet carpet road
- Parking for 2 vehicles
- Remote & Roller Shutter gate

3 km to Malabe Junction,SLIIT ,
1.1 km to New Kandy road (At Pittugala junction)
2.5 km to Nevil Fernando Hospital,,Horizon international school and Horizon campus.
4 access roads to Malabe Junction

LKR 8,100,000
